english.segment1: Who are we. That You would be mindful of us. What do You see. Thats worth looking our way
english.segment2: We are free. In ways that we never should be. Sweet release. From the grip of these chains
english.segment3: Like hinges straining from the weight. My heart no longer can keep from singing
english.segment4: Chorus. All that is within me cries. For You alone be glorified. Emmanuel. God with us
english.segment5: My heart sings a brand new song. The debt is paid these chains are gone. Emmanuel. God with us
english.segment6: Lord You know. Our hearts dont deserve Your glory. Still You show. A love we cannot afford
english.segment7: Like hinges straining from the weight. My heart no longer can keep from singing
english.segment9: Bridge. Such a tiny offering compared to Calvary. Nevertheless we lay it at Your feet
